articles.description: Having started their World Cup campaign with a 6-2 thrashing of Iran, England regressed in the meeting with the US, which ended in stalemate and fans were unimpressed with the performance.
articles.content: DC United manager Wayne Rooney has accused England fans of being too stubborn to recognize that the quality of American soccer is ever-improving after Three Lions supporters booed their 0-0 World Cup… [+4046 chars]

articles.author: Lewis Browning
articles.title: UFC star Paddy Pimblett shocks woman by appearing on her video doorbell - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 27-year-old, who boasts a record of 19 wins and three defeats in MMA, arrived at the house to ask for water to wash away the mess, and was recognised instantly by the homeowner.
articles.content:
UFC star Paddy Pimblett has shocked a woman by turning up to her house to ask for water to wash away an accident caused by his dog.

articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo described as "total genius" by FIFA for role in Portugal World Cup win - The Mirror
articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo won a controversial penalty for Portugal in their opening World Cup win over Ghana and FIFA has praised his "total genius" actions in the incident
articles.content:
